item.title: 分类问题与回归问题指标综述
item.description: ref: [1] https://www.cnblogs.com/rushup0930/p/13359513.html [2] https://blog.csdn.net/u013250861/article/details/123029585#t12 [3] https://blog.csdn.net/wf592523813/article/details/95202448 [4] https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/69101372 classification 分类 主要涉及的知识点： 混淆矩阵、Precision(精准率)、Recall(召回率)、Accuracy(准确率)、F1-
